text:
I may be misunderstanding - but you can use the schema endpoints to retrieve standard object schemata, including association info. Just plug in “ticket”, “deal” etc.

With the big caveat being, I’m pretty sure it won’t give you label data. Just the default.

Also, I’m pretty sure they more or less stopped enforcing/supporting cardinality options. Everything ends up being created as a many to many (there are a few exceptions to this rule when it comes to HubSpot created associations). Though, depending on the direction, the association ID will be different, which might be what you meant.

I am using React JS.

Can anyone help me on this?
but in this way i am not able to see how much nps_score that particular user has given in this particular event ?
